newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Creative shares jump on 1st qtr results.
newsitem.headline: Creative shares jump on 1st qtr results.

text.p: Multimedia company Creative Technology leapt over 10 percent in early trading, cheered by its first quarter results.
At 0120 GMT, Creative rose Singapore S$0.85 to S$9.85, after touching a morning high of S$10.
Over the weekend, Creative reported its first quarter net profit for the quarter ended September 30 rose 121 percent to US$14.7 million.
The company turned in the first set of positive results after two quarters of losses.

"I think it's pretty good but analysts are saying it's more due to a cut-down of administrative costs," said an institutional dealer. "There is some speculative buying," he added.--Singapore newsroom (65-8703080)
